name: Image
desc: A JSON object for a Snapshot URL that describes the characteristics of custom images to use for map annotations.

items.name: height
items.desc: The height of the image in scale-independent pixels.

items.name: url
items.desc: The full URL that specifies the location of the image. As an alternative, you may provide a data URL.

items.name: width
items.desc: The width of the image in scale-independent pixels.
